pageProps.title: Principles
pageProps.content:
### Solve other people’s problems
- Try to be a solution, not a problem
- Walk in your customer’s shoes
### Listen actively
Understand why other people do what they do
### See signal and ignore noise
Define important things and pay attention to them.
### Make notes
 Write down important things.
### Be boring
- Discipline is useful
- Overtime is destructive in a long term
